name: Gourav Mittal
tagline: AI/ML Engineer | Full-Stack Developer | Competitive Programmer

content.heading: Hi, I'm Gourav Mittal!
content.subtitle: Computer Science Engineer | BIT Mesra (8.25 CGPA)
content.description: Welcome to my interactive 3D portfolio! I'm passionate about AI/ML, full-stack development, and solving complex algorithmic problems. Currently pursuing B.Tech at BIT Mesra, graduating in 2026.
highlights: 🏆 Amazon ML Summer School 2025 - Top 5% nationwide
💡 All India Rank 124 in Bajaj HackRX 6.0

content.heading: Technical Expertise
content.subtitle: Full-Stack Development | ML/AI Specialization | Data Science
content.description: Comprehensive technical skills across programming languages, frameworks, cloud platforms, and data engineering.
items: 💻 Languages: Python, SQL, C++, JavaScript, R, HTML/CSS
🤖 ML & AI: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, LangChain, Hugging Face, RAG, NLP, LLMs
☁️ Cloud: AWS (Lambda, SageMaker, Bedrock), GCP (Vertex AI, BigQuery, Cloud Run)
🔧 DevOps: Docker, CI/CD Pipelines, Git, Pytest, TDD, Infrastructure as Code
📊 Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, DynamoDB, BigQuery
🌐 Web: React Native, FastAPI, RESTful APIs, Microservices
📈 Data Science: A/B Testing, Statistical Analysis, Time Series, Power BI, Tableau

content.heading: Featured Projects
content.subtitle: Production-Ready ML Systems | Full-Stack Applications
content.description: Showcasing my best work in AI/ML, full-stack development, and data engineering.
items: 🎯 Enterprise RAG Pipeline - 94.2% accuracy, Google Cloud deployment, 100+ concurrent users
✨ Aura AI Platform - AWS serverless, dual-engine trust & clarity system
🍽️ AI Meal Planner - Fine-tuned LLM, React Native app, smart pantry sync
📈 Algorithmic Trading - Neural networks (TCN, LSTM, Transformer) for Indian markets

content.heading: Work Experience
content.subtitle: To-let Globe | Data Analyst Intern | Apr-Jul 2025
content.description: Drove data-driven insights for marketing campaigns and operational optimization at a real estate technology company.
items: 📊 Analyzed 2M+ social media impressions & 149K website views
📈 Built 4 interactive Power BI dashboards - reduced reporting time by 70%
🎯 Classified 41K+ social followers & identified posts with 5K+ engagements
⚡ Automated data cleaning for 250K+ daily records using Excel, Power BI, SQL
🏅 Received formal management recognition for actionable insights
